name: Sniper Gun War - City Survival
description:
We need a hero with courage and skills to fight against the criminals now!
You will get deep into different areas of the city- the garrison, the town, the port, to eliminate all the criminals!
It’s very dangerous to reveal the evil plan of destroying the city. But luckily you have multi weapons and ammos to arm yourself!

Features:
● Diversified weapon system:
More 5 types of weapons including AK47 and M400. Not to mention the HE grenades, sniping rifles, pistols and machine guns… Now just go to earn gold coins and use to exchange for your exclusive weapons!
● Creative challenge map:
This is a real battlefield- the awesome 3D model combines with modern anti-terrorism topic. 4 classic scene maps are waiting for you to challenge. Come on and explore them!
● Smooth first-person shooting game!
The excellent ballistic and recoil simulate the real shooting.
Support for customizing slide agility: our shooting system allows you to customize the shooting feel.
Try the new adrenaline function and defeat the enemy to gain a thrilling experience!
● Unique reward system:
Multi game rewards are waiting for you: log in everyday to claim daily rewards and you can also claim free weapons by logging in continuously. The rich gold coins can use to exchange for the weapons you like.

No Wi-Fi? No problem! Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere!
Take up your weapon, destroy the enemy and complete your missions!
It’s time to join the battle and protect the city!
